column5: FYI....Our group just had to cancel our 2nd trip back up in August. We were headed back in with TLO to Abamasagi the week of August28-Sept4th That week is now available to anyone if interested I mentioned to Chad id post this up and he thought a good idea If the borders open im sure ALL weeks will get filled up. If not, theres a week available for some Ont guys. We fished Aba that week last yr and it was fantastic Feel free to msg me if you want, otherwise go ahead and get ahold of Chad or Dawn at TLO Good luck Cheers
